title: Get write stream details
description: Retrieves information about an existing BigQuery write stream. Use this to check the state and schema of a stream before appending data.

objective.narrative: Developers need to confirm a write stream's properties, such as its schema and commit state, before sending data. This check helps to prevent schema mismatch errors or attempts to write to a finalized stream.

regionTags.name: bigquerystorage_v1_bigquerywrite_writestream_get
regionTags.title: Get write stream details
regionTags.description: Retrieves information about an existing BigQuery write stream. Use this to check the state and schema of a stream before appending data.
